title: Strictly Come Dancing fans fume as David James is voted off the show
text:
David James wasn’t as confident as Mike (Picture: Guy Levy/BBC)

Strictly Come Dancing fans are in a rage about voting again after David James and Nadiya Bychkova lost out to Mike Bushell and Katya Jones.

Sunday’s results episode had the four try their hardest to be saved during the dance-off, but judges chose to save Mike because of the enthusiasm he had while giving us his best samba.

When you shake your butt like Mike did, you kind of have to be confident.

Craig Revel Horwood said: ‘The couple I’d like to save are the most confident performers and I thought sold the number better and that was Mike and Katya.’

David felt he let Nadiya down but Nadiya was ‘so proud’ of his growth.

However, many fans were still raging about the result given that Dev Griffin and Dianne Buswell were eliminated last week.

Mike and Katya were saved (Picture: Guy Levy/BBC/PA Wire)

Fans are not happy (Picture: Twitter/TheVintageYear)

One fan wrote: ‘It’s more and more obvious the judges are favouring bbc employees #strictlyresults #strictly’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘In my humble opinion, there are some very rum judging decisions this season,’ another fan tweeted. ‘I’d have sacked Mike on the basis that his dance was an insult to the samba and offensive to everyone else.’

All four judges picked to save Mike despite his booty-shaking confusing all of us watching at home.

‘What an absolute fix #strictly,’ a fan tweeted.

Another viewer wrote: ‘Well well well. I stand corrected. I guess they wanted to keep the comic relief #strictly #BBCStrictly’.

Now that the eliminations are over with, we can all look forward to next week’s Halloween episode.

We are all eagerly waiting to witness Karim Zeroual and Amy Dowden show off their Stranger Things Paso.

Meanwhile, Michelle Visage clearly knows what her fans love and are giving us her best Morticia Addams from The Addams Family.

Only a week to go before we get to witness some spooky pasos and sambas.

MORE: When is Bruno Tonioli back on Strictly Come Dancing?
description: Strictly Come Dancing fans are even more convinced the show is 'fixed' after saving BBC staff Mike Bushell and eliminating David and Nadiya.
